text:
@GOPChairwoman When the Russian Right @GOP led Senate wanted to gut health care or hand the rich and big corporations a $1.5 trillion Tax Scam they stayed up all night.

But when the middle class is impacted by Coronavirus and need help, they say f*ck it.
